data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 5 believers in Trashigang that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trashigang, Bhutan

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Trashigang, Bhutan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Trashigang words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,378 who are far from you in Trashigang, Bhutan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bodo (Muslim traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Trashigang, Bhutan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Trashigang who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Trashigang, Bhutan has a population of 2,400.

We estimate Trashigang has 5 people who might know Jesus, 17 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,378 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 479 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 5 believers in the state of Trashigang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
